About Me

Todd C. Oriarte

Student at Nucamp

This is my site and portfolio. I am transitioning careers from a project manager to a software developer. The past 5 years I have have been serving in Higher Education but since I was let go from my last position in Japan, due to global pandemic, I have been retraining and sharpening my skills in programming. I am a dedicated and reliable worker who adds value to any company or institution. Consider me to fill in a position with your company and you will not regret it.

Goals

Mission, What?

My mission is to provide top quality web & app development, project management, and branding to both employers and partners.

Vision, Why?

Building a great professional career and company reputation by producing the most creative and innovated team of diverse talent to find solutions to any problem.

Action Steps, How?

To get 1% better each day, and to find great mentors to guide me into becoming a great programmer.

Todd Oriarte
Web & Mobile Developer
